{{Wired embedded system |brand=CUJO |model=Smart Firewall |revision=(A0001) |upc=853296007020 |asin=B017B53DLY |price=249 |manuf_country=USA |is_manuf=No |availability=EoL (03/31/2021) |est_release_date=08/2016 |pcb_id=5002-1307 REVD |type=firewall |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CN7020 |cpu1_cspeed=1.0 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |cpu2_brand=Cypress |cpu2_model=CY8C4124AXI-443 |cpu2_cspeed=24 |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=Kingston |fla1_model=EMMC04G-S100 |fla2=16 KiB |fla2_brand=Cypress |fla2_model=CY8C4124AXI-443 |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Kingston |ram1_model=D2516EC4BXGGB |ram1_num=2 |ram2=4 KiB |ram2_brand=Cypress |ram2_model=CY8C4124AXI-443 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Vitesse |eth_chip2_model=VSC8514-11 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |flags=RTC w/ battery, heatsink |default_ip=192.168.0.1 }} {{TagLine|Smart Internet Firewall}}
"CUJO", "5/3/16" and "5002-1307 REVD" :are silkscreened on the board top.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Cavium]] CN7020 Dual-core [[MIPS64]] @1.0GHz *PSoC: [[Cypress]] CY8C4124AXI ARM (Cortex-M0) @24MHz *Storage: 4GB (eMMC 5.1) *Memory: 1GB (DDR3L) SDRAM *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet ports *Power Source: 5V 2A via barrel
==Images== <gallery> File:CUJO Smart Firewall Top.jpeg|Board Top File:CUJO Smart Firewall Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:CUJO Smart Firewall LED Board Top.jpeg|LED Board Top File:CUJO Smart Firewall LED Board Bottom.jpeg|LED Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
